text: Sarah Tomerlin Lee (1910 - 2001) was a magazine editor and author, retail executive, and interior designer. She led the interior design firm of Tom Lee, Ltd. from 1971 to 1993, and was head of the interior design division at the architectural firm of Beyer, Binder, Belle from 1993 until her retirement in 1997. Lee was responsible for the design of over forty hotels and inns in the United States. == References == Category:Interior designers Category:1910 births Category:2001 deaths
title: Sarah Tomerlin Lee
